trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> that is published in the editing context and that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer is in a read-only state.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> som er publisert i redigering konteksten og som angir om den [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer er i en skrivebeskyttet tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Visual elements can bind to this property in order to provide different behavior in a read-only state (such as the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox> disallowing edits and setting the state to “Disabled”).
trans-unit.target: Visuelle elementer kan binde til denne egenskapen for å kunne tilby ulike virkemåter i en skrivebeskyttet tilstand (slik som den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox>fjerner redigeringer og angivelse av tilstanden til "Deaktivert").</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox>

trans-unit.source: If a hosting application would like to set the designer to a read-only state, this <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> can be retrieved and can be set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et verts-program vil angi designer til en skrivebeskyttet tilstand dette <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>kan hentes og kan settes til `false`.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.ReadOnlyState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Hosting.ReadOnlyState"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om objektet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis objektet er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current object.
